DOC.brief_summary: To compare clinical efficacy systemic side effect 2.5 % 10 % phenylephrine mydriasis diabetic patient darkly pigment iris .
DOC.brief_title: 2.5 % 10 % Phenylephrine Mydriasis Diabetic Patients With Darkly Pigmented Irides
DOC.detailed_description: One hundred patient diabetes Srinagarind Hospital Eye Clinic enrol randomize two group block randomization . In group I ( 50 patient ) , 1 % tropicamide combine 2.5 % phenylephrine administer dilate pupil whereas 1 % tropicamide combine 10 % phenylephrine use Group II ( 50 patient ) . Pupil diameter , blood pressure heart rate measure eye drop instillation .
DOC.criteria: diabetic patient history intraocular surgery laser treatment , ocular disease might affect pupil size glaucoma , uveitis , Horner 's syndrome , Adies ' pupil , history allergy drug use , hypertension
